title: Winter skin ideas- Azir and Karma
body:
Santa Azir
His soldiers would be reindeer that attack with their antlers. 
He would wear a Santa suit 

Snow Angel Karma 
Q- snowball 
W- candy cane 
E- snowy (like a snow globe)

replies.body:
Your idea deserves multiple cookies. 

How would karmas empowered abilities look?
Her Q could poof out snow flakes on hit and have frozen ground in the age. W could glow brighter or be thicker. E would poof out snowflakes
